parameters.name: GroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group. You can call [ListResources](~~449143~~) to obtain the name of the resource group.

parameters.name: Labels
parameters.description: The tags. Multiple tags are separated by commas (,).

parameters.name: Option
parameters.description:
The operation to perform. Valid values:

*   DetachAndDelete: disassociates a resource from a workspace and deletes the resource in the workspace. This is the default value.
*   Detach: disassociates a resource group from a workspace.

parameters.name: ProductType
parameters.description: **This field is no longer used and will be removed. Use the ResourceType field instead.

parameters.name: ResourceIds
parameters.description: The resource IDs. Multiple resource IDs are separated by commas (,). The GroupName values for the specified resources must be the same. You cannot leave both GroupName and ResourceIds empty. You can specify both parameters.

parameters.name: ResourceType
parameters.description:
The resource type. Valid values:

*   ECS
*   Lingjun
*   ACS
*   FLINK
*   MaxCompute (This resource type is valid only if Option is set to Detach.)

parameters.name: WorkspaceId
parameters.description: The workspace ID. You can call [ListWorkspaces](~~449124~~) to obtain the workspace ID.
